sentences.sContent: Those European and North American young then return to their respective coasts to begin the unusual life cycle of the eel anew.
sentences.sContent_eng: Those European and North American young then return to their respective coasts to begin the unusual life cycle of the eel anew.
sentences.sCn: 那些欧洲和北美洲的幼鱼就会回到它们各自的海岸，重新开始鳗鱼独特的生命周期。

sentences.sContent: In a review study published in 2007 in the journal Ibis, researchers looked through European and North American bird journals and other references dating back to the late 19th century.
sentences.sContent_eng: In a review study published in 2007 in the journal Ibis, researchers looked through European and North American bird journals and other references dating back to the late 19th century.
sentences.sCn: 在2007 年《朱鹭》杂志发表的回顾性研究中，研究人员查阅了回溯到19 世纪后期的欧洲和北美洲鸟类期刊和其他的参考文献。

sentences.sContent: B Ah, they’re definitely North American – I think they’re Canadians and Americans.
sentences.sContent_eng: B Ah, they’re definitely North American – I think they’re Canadians and Americans.
sentences.sCn: B 啊，他们当然是北美人——我想他们是加拿大人和美国人。

trans.tranOther: of or relating to North America or its inhabitants
